Uses of Package
jGame.core.entity

Packages that use jGame.core.entity
Package Description
jGame.core.entity
This package contains all classes required for proper construction of any entity and correct updating/rendering.
jGame.core.entity.event
Package containing classes responsible for managing collisions between an entity and the walls of the game/another entity.
jGame.core.launcher
The main package of the framework, where the entry point for every game (GameLauncher) is located.
jGame.core.ui
This class holds a collection of UI-related classes, such as a displayable window or utility functionality to aid in the process of window-making.
  • Classes in jGame.core.entity used by jGame.core.entity
    Class Description
    Animation
    Class responsible for performing animations on entity sprites: rolling through a series of images, thus creating the illusion of animation.
    Entity
    This is the base class for all entities involved in the gameplay, weather it be players or AI.
    Sprite
    This class acts as a way of displaying custom entity visuals, supporting animations for said entities.
  • Classes in jGame.core.entity used by jGame.core.entity.event
    Class Description
    Entity
    This is the base class for all entities involved in the gameplay, weather it be players or AI.
  • Classes in jGame.core.entity used by jGame.core.launcher
    Class Description
    Entity
    This is the base class for all entities involved in the gameplay, weather it be players or AI.
  • Classes in jGame.core.entity used by jGame.core.ui
    Class Description
    Entity
    This is the base class for all entities involved in the gameplay, weather it be players or AI.
